name: Dont Let The Noob In
description:
The noobs! They are trying to steal your bobux!!! Shoot at them to stop them! But dont confuse them with pros who GIVES you bobux! 

Click to shoot

There is an enemy indicator at top of them so when a noob and a pro spawns together you will have a chance to see one of them if you see red just shoot, dont worry if there is a pro they wont get harm 

But if you dont see red and only the pro dont shoot! You will lose HP

At the shop you can buy extra hearts with 20 bobux!!!(limited to 5) 

If you entered the shop and want to exit just click the buy button even though you dont have any bobux you will get out

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Beta version, there will be more upgrades and more enemies in the future.

BUGS MAY OCCUR PLEASE WRITE THEM IN COMMENTS
